metadata.description: Everyone knows the Brothers Grimm fairytales, but what if the versions you heard were only part of the story? In this enchanting manga, Kei Ishiyama puts her own creative spin on these beloved tales. Featuring "Little Red Riding Hood", "Hansel and Gretel", "Rapuzel", The Two Brothers", and "The Twelve Hunters".. This fantasy manga retells these timeless tales... but with a new twist!
metadata.name: Grimms Manga Tales
